name: MoonBox
description:
MoonBox is a epic battle simulator game. Want to play a shooter or a slash game? You can do both by controlling any unit in 1st Person view. Throw grenades, launch rockets and place mines to protect the side of your choosing.



MoonBox is a sandbox game. Create tower defense, zombie squad and watch them battle!


MoonBox is a tower defense game. Created too many zombies and zombie attack? No problem! Build towers to defend your marines. Build tower defense. Stop undead zombie horde!


MoonBox is a physics and 3D game. Explosions and epic flights. Particles and destruction are all found here.



MoonBox is a tactics game. Experiment with tactics in the battle for the moon quest!



MoonBox is zombies: Stop aliens and zombies! Shoot zombies with rockets! Its real zombie shooter game!



Download MoonBox - Zombie defense Sandbox game for FREE!


If you are experiencing any problems, please do get in contact with me here: dev@supermoonbox.com

Leave a feedback or suggestions if you want to see more features and units in this free new zombie game!
